Rescue at Auckland’s Muriwai Beach: Lifeguards rescue two stranded girls from rocky outpost https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rescue-at-aucklands-muriwai-beach-lifeguards-rescue-two-stranded-girls-from-rocky-outpost/3TUCCC56J5F5JHTNNU3VOXAJ54/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/rescue-at-aucklands-muriwai-beach-lifeguards-rescue-two-stranded-girls-from-rocky-outpost/3TUCCC56J5F5JHTNNU3VOXAJ54/ Rescuers were able to guide the pair along the rocks to safety rather than use a jetski. Mon, 02 Sep 2024 02:33:46 +0000 Police and Muriwai Volunteer Lifeguard Service rescued two people trapped on rocks. Photo / supplied
Transport Accident Investigation Commission seeks witnesses in Wellington plane fire https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/transport-accident-investigation-commission-seeks-witnesses-in-wellington-plane-fire/RE7W3AHTGNDMLBKHKIQL7ME2FU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/transport-accident-investigation-commission-seeks-witnesses-in-wellington-plane-fire/RE7W3AHTGNDMLBKHKIQL7ME2FU/ Dramatic video on social media showed the plane arriving with smoke billowing behind it. Mon, 02 Sep 2024 02:27:58 +0000 Fire and Emergency were advised of an ATR aircraft engine fire in Wellington.
HDC breached paramedic and EMT after adrenaline incorrectly given to patient causing cardiac arrest https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hdc-breached-paramedic-and-emt-after-adrenaline-in Correctly-given-to-病人-causing-cardiac-arrest/LQOPLHXRHRH4PL5WGCI43BS5QM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hdc-breached-paramedic-and-emt-after-adrenaline-in Correctly-given-to-病人-causing-cardiac-arrest/LQOPLHXRHRH4PL5WGCI43BS5QM/ Jeremy WilkinsonAn ambulance had been called to the woman who was experiencing an anaphylactic reaction. Mon, 02 Sep 2024 02:11:35 +0000 A third dose of adrenaline was incorrectly administered, causing the patient to go into cardiac arrest. Photo / 123RF
